title: Storm Spear
summaries: The Storm Spear is a pre-Hardmode spear that fires a Storm Spear Shot when thrust, a small, non-piercing bolt of electricity that deals 150% of the spear's base damage (21 damage) and inflicts half its knockback (base knockback of 3 (Very weak)). The Storm Spear has a 1/7 (14.29%) chance of being found in Sandstone Chests in the Underground Desert and a 1/8 (12.5%) chance of being found in Oasis Crates and Mirage Crates obtained from fishing in the Oasis.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 14 (spear) / 21 (Storm Spear Shot) (Melee)
statistics.Sell: 30 SC
